| HistoryText             = Null-Trons were ancient [[Kree]] robots. Their sole purpose was the punishment of those who committed transgressions against the [[Kree Empire]]. The [[Supreme Intelligence (Earth-616)|Supreme Intelligence]] prohibited their use when he first came to power.{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 1 44}}

In an elaborated plot to gain [[Richard Jones (Earth-616)|Rick Jones]]'s soul, which would allow him access to the [[:Glossary:Destiny Force|Destiny Force]]. He sent the previously banned robots to [[Deneb IV]], to wage war on the planet.{{r|Captain Marvel Vol 1 44|45}}
